DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy Triple Combination Therapy compare Fixed Combination brimonidine tartrate/timolol ophthalmic solution patient primary open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Triple Combination Therapy Patients With Primary Open-Angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.mesh_term: Brimonidine Tartrate , Timolol Maleate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Ocular hypertension primary openangle glaucoma eye Requires treatment IOPlowering medication eye Required chronic use ocular medication study study medication Use corticosteroid within 30 day History prior eye surgery , except uncomplicated eye surgery perform 6 month Screening visit Anticipated wear contact lens study
